channel.title: Node.js on Apache Dubbo
channel.description: Recent content in Node.js on Apache Dubbo

item.title: Apache Dubbo's First Node.js 3.0-alpha Version Officially Released
item.description:
About Apache Dubbo3

Apache Dubbo is an easy-to-use, high-performance WEB and RPC framework, providing capabilities, tools, and best practices for creating enterprise-level microservices including service discovery, traffic governance, observability, and authentication. After several years of development, Dubbo3 has been widely promoted across Alibaba Groupâ€™s business lines, successfully replacing the HSF framework that had been in operation for years; meanwhile, the multi-language ecosystem of Dubbo3 has also developed rapidly, currently covering:
